Reviews.Content: booked hotel basis contributors recommendation location accurate hotel rialto bridge ten minute walk san marco plenty busy streets roundabout nice shopping didnt overpriced food evening hotel solely location booked grand canal view surprised shown 1030am gotten cruise ship surprise shock curtains grand canal view totally obscured vaparetto station slap bang front vaparetto bangs station arrival ten minutes doubt dead slept plus view canal downstairs reception acted girly pathetic changed view bridge canal paid pleasant smiley gent reception helpful mornings battle wills key reception else husband patronised establishments view otherwise clean tired mini bar ok shower strength bathroom shutters windows allowed sleep boat life canal pretty 24hrs day noticed outside balcony seats table worth luck breakfast cramped food nondescript breakfast staff trained lord snooty school hospitality ladies loo foyer departing sorry guys strayed gents disgusting glad roll loo paper handbag toilet service cafe attached front hotel cafe patrons none regrettably location 300 euros night expected bedroom redecorated past twenty venice totally unique experience rialto hotel probably venice overpriced chock block people venice die possibly

Reviews.Content: obviously outside rialto bridge 10 minute walk st marks sq perfect location advise travel agent paid 50 euro private water taxi st lucia train station waste money paid euro water bus line drops outside hotel paid run house expecting run instead 50 sq meters total bathroom private courtyard getting weird else using lift walk thru lobby thru restaurant door accross courtyard building 50 stairs thru hall didnt bother experience venice checked able collect luggage carry ourselves downsides hotel staff spoke english breakfast pointless minimal selection tiny tv couldnt english speaking channels service offered restaurant front 10 discount staying hotel wasnt location probably wouldnt recommend hotel youre lucky hotel outhouse imagine hotel experience

Reviews.Title: “Good location, let down by facilities and service”
Reviews.Author: athegrate
Reviews.Content: central location near rialto bridge grand canal unfortunately facilities antiquated equipment electricity supply reliable using own equipment trips easily lack power charge mobile phones etc internet access receiving tv channels front desk helpful breakfast staff surly

Reviews.Title: “Great staff and a great location.”
Reviews.Author: Travelswithsmallgirl
Reviews.Content: hotel location adjacent ponte rialto near vaporetti stops rialto mercato rialto walking distance saint marks yards restaurants bars little weird lobby alley flight stairs building isnt venice alley found suite separate bed 9year daughter windows onto alley quiet night quieter front house icelandic disrupted travel plans thats started staff polite accomodating tried rearrange flights checked airport found flight cancelled returned hotel rate nights found flight rome left morning peep desk happy found flight hotel extra efforts access computers juggled flight schedules waiving posted internet access fees definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “What a rip off !!”
Reviews.Author: FozzoNorthWales
Reviews.Content: arrived venice airport 6th april instant interpretation venice money little return arrived water taxi rialto hotel shown junior suite joke overlooking alley bed stone slab shabby shower bath mixer tap awfull breakfast insult tinned fresh fruit salad processed orange juice tiny bread rolls boiled eggs cooked extra tables crushed cheese ham salami offered cheap tasteless food venice overpriced rubbish pizza panini abundance total rip dont harrys bar 35 euro 2 peach juice served dick white coat wales heaven

Reviews.Title: “Great location and good room with view”
Reviews.Author: TooLateDave
Reviews.Content: central location rialto bridge upgraded canal view excellent size windows giving superb view rialto bridge grand canal service friendly efficient breakfast fine offering wide range cereal fruit bread cold cheese meat people location little noisy boats unload rialto night didnt bother friends

Reviews.Title: “Great holiday”
Reviews.Author: molliecat
Reviews.Content: five days seen reviews rialto hotel job notice read hotel location perfect canal view lovely plenty bathroon roomy spotless reception lovely trouble breakfast normal fresh kept filled snow venice special morning blue sky everyday wonderfull holiday nice hotel rialto

Reviews.Title: “Clean but terrible rooms. will not return”
Reviews.Author: knitgusknit
Reviews.Content: hotel located grand canal heart venice altho clean musty water stained wall coverings thin bare carpet smelled cramped uncomfortable decorated venitian style updated bathrom cramped couldnt 3 people daughter cot worn mattress desk clerk acted surley doing favor check pleasant american breakfast ok typical italian breakfast buffet stayed hotels par fruit cocktail instead fresh fruit poor quality meats cheeses unfortunate snowed missed venice famous beautiful streets etc city summer stay hotel recommend

Reviews.Title: “Perfect get away”

Reviews.Content: hotel treat easy access vaporetto 2 train station rialto bridge presto youre splurge canal view balcony cant walk windows ledge sit glass wine view staff friendly euro standards bath tub treat stay anytime romantic moments

Reviews.Title: “Mean Breakfast”

Reviews.Content: read negative reviews decided book rialto location overlooking bridge wonderful enjoyed noise canal trafficthe breakfast poorest breakfast ive reviewers found staff rude found courteous except pair totally oblivious guests left waiting lift door five minutes telling repaired time reported seeing walk commented thatits strange didnt laugh cry id feel soul venice

Reviews.Content: youd hard pushed location overlooking rialto bridge wonderful times day night nearby bus stop outside catch water buses staff corteous friendly helpful information directions found efficient sweet little kitsch smile value money venice
